short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows the user to vouch media to friends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds a shortcut to quickly add the current browser URL to MediaVouch. Use this to save the current media you're  viewing so you can consume it later or share with friends.
